mapper.select: select user_id, user_serial_number, user_account, user_name, user_password, user_nickname, user_avatar, user_description, user_personal_signature, user_mailbox, user_gender, user_occupation, user_telephone, user_company, user_school, user_photos, user_address, user_birthday, user_location, user_attribute, user_type, user_status, user_likes, user_level, user_experience, user_registration_time, user_update_time, user_sign_in, user_login_count, user_login_time from movie_user where user_id = #{userId}
